ygData.subject: Re: Need to find Diamond Dust!! Plz Help!
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Check with the Ogres at the entrance to Rathe Mts from Lake of Rathe.  They are indifferent to everyone as they are quest ogres for making some of the
ygData.messageBody:
>I got a Diamond today from plane of hate but no dust, maybe a diamond would
>work?

>> Where is Diamond Dust found? i am stuck at 102 skill and find it hard to
>> believe that the aqua lung is the next step up from probes. i also
>attempted
>> a lung at skill 102...failed.
>> somoe else posted that they believe the gem cutter is the next step
>> item..and i must say i agree with this, if only we could find the diamond
>> dust...
>> so please, anyone who might know this information, please post it here so
>> that your fellow gnomes can trudge on through the skill in the hopes of
>one
>> day tinkering a rebreather that is "trivial." thx.

Check with the Ogres at the entrance to Rathe Mts from Lake of Rathe. They
are indifferent to everyone as they are quest ogres for making some of the
special metals for the quests. I think I remembe one of them saying that
they can crush stuff.
Personally I would not want to waste a diamond. Those things are kinda
rare and expensive. But you may want to check this out if your interested.

Lomack, Knight Defender of the BCK
Master of Recruiting
www.bck.org
"The Crimson Knights"
Fennin Ro
